text.0:
A photo posted on Facebook showing footballer Cristiano Ronaldo wearing a beret branded with the badge of Uganda's People Power Movement has been ALTERED.

:camera_with_flash: The footballer is not wearing headwear in the original photo: https://t.co/ZXYBxNxE4M
text.1:
A photo posted on Facebook showing Kenya's Deputy President William Ruto pushing a wheelbarrow during Mashujaa Day celebrations in Kisii County is ALTERED.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: The original image does not have a wheelbarrow in it: https://t.co/oHDW7aaRu8
text.2:
:police_car_light: HOAX: A website claiming that telecom firm Safaricom is giving its Kenyan subscribers KSh 4,100 as part of the company’s 20th anniversary celebration is fake.

:warning_selector: Safaricom has warned the public about the scam: https://t.co/oAhWHg1Dkx
